meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from cotton or wool.
meanings.sent1: The cozy blanket was made of soft domett.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress made of domett to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The domett fabric whispered secrets to the tailor.
meanings.sent4: The domett material hugged her like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The domett cloth felt like a cloud against her skin.

meanings.definition: To cover or furnish with domett.
meanings.sent1: He decided to domett the chairs for the party.
meanings.sent2: The decorator will domett the room with colorful fabrics.
meanings.sent3: She dometted the table with a festive tablecloth.
meanings.sent4: The artist dometted the canvas with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The gardener dometted the garden with blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells domett.
meanings.sent1: The skilled domett crafted beautiful tapestries.
meanings.sent2: She visited the local domett to buy fabric for her project.
meanings.sent3: The friendly domett greeted customers with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The talented domett showcased their creations at the fair.
meanings.sent5: The experienced domett knew all the best fabrics to use.
